Header <boost/convert/parameters.hpp>

namespace boost {
  namespace cnv {

    enum adjust { left, right, center };

    enum base { bin = =2, oct = =8, dec = =10, hex = =16 };

    enum notation { fixed, scientific, hex };
    namespace parameter {
    }
  }
}
